jp: クイーン・エリザベス
lb:
Reduces [Main Battery] CD by 5 seconds.
Refined Taste upgraded to Level 2.
During [Main Battery Salvo], adds a chance to activate [Cut-in].

Unlocks Overshoot buff, for every [Main Battery Salvo] fired, increases the next shot's damage by 6%. Stacks up to 5 times, lasts till end of the battle.
Refined Taste upgraded to Level 3.
During Day Battle, increases [Main Battery Salvo] damage by 10%.

[Main Battery Salvo] now has a 50% chance to penetrate the citadel of an enemy, increasing damage done by 20%.
If the penetrated target sinks, target will explode, dealing 12% damage to all other enemy ships.
Refined Taste upgraded to Level 4.

skills.name: Class Skill
skills.text: Can attack from long range, reload time: 20s

skills.name: <td class="text-center">Full Salvo - Ultimate (火力全開 ·極)
text:
During battle, inflict 125% of Firepower to all enemies 1 second after first [Main Battery Salvo].
2. If Warspite is in the same fleet, increases damage of QE's first [Main Battery Salvo] by 20%.

skills.name: <td class="text-center">Protection (援護)
text:
If a friendly ship is under a [Main Battery] attack, and if Queen Elizabeth has at least 75% of her Max HP remaining, [Protection] can be activated:
Takes the incoming damage instead and reduces it by 80%. Can only proc 2 times in battle.

skills.name: <td class="text-center">Queenly Mindseet(女王の心境)
text: During an Allied [Main Battery Salvo], if an enemy ship has been sunk, increases Queen Elizabeth's damage by 6%, stacks up to 10 times in the same battle.
